name: Blind Love (itch) (HamsterSophia)
description:
You act as a blind creature in this game where you can feel the world right under you through your power.

You can have the power to rain after approaching the river. 

You can have the power to play music after approaching the music node. 

Survive by avoiding the red lines which comes from the world like you and tries to hurt you.

 You as a kind creature who wishes to care the environment will have certain tasks to complete. 

I wish you good luck!

Press Esc can return to the main menu.
